nodes.bodyText:
I'm not sure to follow.  wildfly-core-feature-pack-common "holds content that is expected to be usable in the legacy fp, the current EE 8 galleon FP, and a future EE 9 galleon FP". It depends on ee-8-api though but we exclude them in this feature pack to bring them back with wildfly-core-feature-pack-ee-8-api.
The comments seems to imply that this is for all ee-8-api dependencies, but you only exclude the JSON API.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,372 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+
+<!--
+  ~ JBoss, Home of Professional Open Source.

+  ~ Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA
+  ~ 02110-1301 USA, or see the FSF site: http://www.fsf.org.
+  -->
+
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <parent>
+        <groupId>org.wildfly.core</groupId>
+        <artifactId>wildfly-core-feature-pack-parent</artifactId>
+        <version>13.0.0.Beta1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+
+    <artifactId>wildfly-core-galleon-pack</artifactId>
+
+    <name>WildFly: Core Galleon Pack</name>
+    <packaging>pom</packaging>
+
+    <properties>
+        <license.directory>${project.build.directory}/resources/content/docs/licenses</license.directory>
+        <common.resources.directory>${basedir}/../common/src/main/resources</common.resources.directory>
+        <ee-8-api.resources.directory>${basedir}/../ee-8-api/src/main/resources</ee-8-api.resources.directory>
+        <legacy.resources.directory>${basedir}/../legacy-feature-pack/src/main/resources</legacy.resources.directory>
+        <galleon-common.resources.directory>${basedir}/../galleon-common/src/main/resources</galleon-common.resources.directory>
+        <common.license.directory>${basedir}/../common/src/license</common.license.directory>
+        <ee-8-api.license.directory>${basedir}/../ee-8-api/src/license</ee-8-api.license.directory>
+    </properties>
+
+    <dependencies>
+
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.wildfly.galleon-plugins</groupId>
+            <artifactId>wildfly-galleon-plugins</artifactId>
+            <scope>provided</scope>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.wildfly.galleon-plugins</groupId>
+            <artifactId>wildfly-config-gen</artifactId>
+            <scope>provided</scope>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <!-- module and copy artifact dependencies -->
+
+        <!-- Bring in all the common deps in one go -->
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>${project.groupId}</groupId>
+            <artifactId>wildfly-core-feature-pack-common</artifactId>
+            <type>pom</type>
+            <scope>provided</scope>
+            <!-- Exclude the ee-8-api dependencies -->

nodes.bodyText:
I only excluded json because that was the one that led to a ban-transitive-dependencies failure.  Excluding the others too would make sense just to avoid confusion or having to do it later.
It does make me wonder why there was no error reported for any of the others.

nodes.bodyText: Hmm, I thought you were asking about the exclusion in the 'common' module pom. TBH I forget exactly why this was needed; I'll investigate.

nodes.bodyText:
I removed it and building with -rf core-feature-pack worked fine so it seems this wasn't necessary.
In the 'common' pom.xml I went ahead and excluded all the EE API artifacts.

nodes.bodyText: should we rename the artifactId to wildfly-core-legacy-feature-pack and accept that starting from now a feature pack means Galleon unless specified otherwise?

nodes.bodyText: never mind, that's a silly suggestion. This artifact is consumed by other project than wildFly and it is not correct to change its GAV just for the sake of changing it.

nodes.bodyText: If we can eventually reach a point where the WildFly galleon FPs no longer depend on the wildfly-core FP, then the GAV of the wildfly-core FP becomes much less importance as most (maybe all) of its use outside core's own build will be gone.

+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+    <parent>
+        <groupId>org.wildfly.core</groupId>
+        <artifactId>wildfly-core-feature-pack-parent</artifactId>
+        <version>13.0.0.Beta1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+    </parent>
+
+    <artifactId>wildfly-core-feature-pack</artifactId>
+
+    <name>WildFly: Core Feature Pack</name>
+    <packaging>pom</packaging>
+
+    <properties>
+        <license.directory>${project.build.directory}/${project.build.finalName}/content/docs/licenses</license.directory>
+        <common.resources.directory>${basedir}/../common/src/main/resources</common.resources.directory>
+        <ee-8-api.resources.directory>${basedir}/../ee-8-api/src/main/resources</ee-8-api.resources.directory>
+        <common.license.directory>${basedir}/../common/src/license</common.license.directory>
+        <ee-8-api.license.directory>${basedir}/../ee-8-api/src/license</ee-8-api.license.directory>
+    </properties>
+
+    <dependencies>
+
+        <!-- module and copy artifact dependencies -->
+
+        <!-- Bring in all the common deps in one go -->
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>${project.groupId}</groupId>
+            <artifactId>wildfly-core-feature-pack-common</artifactId>
+            <type>pom</type>
+        </dependency>

nodes.bodyText: It looks like it was not needed in the Galleon one so I removed it.
